product_name: Guillow's Jetfire Balsa Wood Glider - Package of 2
long_description: The Guillow's Jetfire Balsa Wood Glider package of 2 features a twin set of classic, balsa wood stunt planes with 12 in. wing spans that enable high-flying stunts. Includes assembly instructions and activity ideas.
short_description: The Guillow's Jetfire Balsa Wood Glider package of 2 features a twin set of classic, balsa wood stunt planes with 12 in. wing spans that enable high-flying stunts.
